name: Big Cheeseburger + Fries + Drink Combo
description: Get a juicy Big Cheeseburger, large fries, and a cold soft drink for only $7.99 (regular price $10.49). Save over 25%!

name: Spicy Veggie Pizza (50% Off)
description: Indulge in our flavorful Spicy Veggie Pizza at half price! Made with fresh vegetables and a kick of spice. Limited time offer.

name: Crispy Chicken Wings (Buy 1 Get 1 Free)
description: Double the fun! Buy one order of our crispy chicken wings and get another one absolutely free. Perfect for sharing or enjoying all by yourself.

name: Family Feast (Free Delivery)
description: Enjoy a delicious feast for the whole family! This combo includes two large pizzas, garlic bread, and a bottle of soda. Free delivery included!

name: Fresh Summer Salad (20% Off)
description: Beat the heat with our refreshing Summer Salad! Packed with seasonal vegetables, light dressing, and grilled chicken. Get 20% off for a healthy and delicious meal.
